name: LDJAM39 THE GAME
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 39

Rate and Comment:

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/39/ludum-dare-jam-39-the-game

Have you ever wondered what's it like to participate in Ludum Dare game jam?

Never wonder again!
With this state of the art simulation you can enjoy Ludum Dare all year long.
Featuring:
-Working without any pay.
-Making dangerous amounts of coffee.
-Fully featured dynamic day/night cycle.
-Sun related activities. \o/
-Sleeping on the floor.
-Sleeping on the desk.
-People trying to distract you from your work.
-Canned beverages.
-Worst voice acting in the history of games.

github: https://github.com/vizitas/LDJAM39THEGAME
